articles.author: Pia Singh
articles.title: Stock futures rise after major averages rebound on easing tariff fears: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Major U.S. stock averages immediately jumped after President Donald Trump said he would no longer impose his new Europe tariffs that were set to begin Feb. 1.
articles.content:
Stock futures rose Thursday morning after easing geopolitical fears sparked a broad-based market rally. Traders also looked ahead to a key inflation reading due in the morning.

articles.title: Four Observations from Bayern Munich’s 2-0 Champions League win over Union Saint-Gilloise - Bavarian Football Works
articles.description: It was tough sledding, but FC Bayern has clinched a last 16 berth in Europe.

articles.author: Elisabeth Buchwald, Ana Nicolaci da Costa
articles.title: The EU pushed back on Trump’s latest tariff threats. Hours later, he backed down - CNN
articles.description: A key group of European Parliament members blocked a vote to ratify a US-European trade deal Wednesday after President Donald Trump threatened to take over Greenland and charge as much as an additional 35% tariff on countries opposed to his ambitions.
